classes.name: Compose
classes.description: Used to compose a new view / view-model template or bind to an existing instance

params.name: compositionEngine
params.description: The engine used when composing this view

params.name: viewSlot
params.description: The slot the view will be inserted in to

params.name: viewResources
params.description: The resources available in the current viewSlot

params.name: executionContext
params.description: The context in which the view model is executed in

properties.description: Model to bind the custom element to
properties.name: model

properties.description: View to bind the custom element to
properties.name: view

properties.description: View-model to bind the custom element's template to
properties.name: viewModel

classes.name: If
classes.description:
Binding to conditionally include or not include template logic depending on returned result
- value should be Boolean or will be treated as such (truthy / falsey)

params.name: viewFactory
params.description: The factory used to create the view

params.name: viewSlot
params.description: The slot the view will be inserted in to

classes.name: Repeat
classes.description: Binding to iterate over an array and repeat a template

params.name: viewSlot
params.description: The slot the view is injected in to

properties.description: List of items to bind the repeater to
properties.name: items

classes.name: SanitizeHtml
classes.description: Default Html Sanitizer to prevent script injection

classes.name: Show
classes.description:
Binding to conditionally show markup in the DOM based on the value.
- different from if in that the markup is still added to the DOM, simply not shown

params.name: element
params.description: The element that the to bind to
